detail: Developing iOS apps with Swift/Objective-C, SwiftUI, and UIKit for feature delivery and product maintenance.
highlights: Implemented authentication, payment processing, API integration, Firebase Crashlytics, Remote Config, and push notifications.
Built features such as withdraw, recharge, films, customized tab bar, parental gate, localization, and RevenueCat payments.
Managed App Store submissions and optimized performance and reliability.

detail: Delivered production features across multilingual app variants using SwiftUI, UIKit, and Objective-C.
highlights: Implemented clean architecture (VIP), centralized routing, user management, and refactored API integrations.
Automated CI/CD pipelines with Fastlane and Ruby scripts to reduce deployment time.
Fixed memory leaks and critical bugs and mentored developers on design patterns.

detail: Built features such as credit transfer and QR scanning with reliable API integration in Swift and UIKit.
highlights: Created unit tests for maintainability and regression safety.
Converted Objective-C modules to Swift to modernize the codebase.

detail: Completed iOS development training in Objective-C and supported app feature delivery in Agile workflows.
highlights: Recognized as Best Trainee during iOS training.
Contributed to bug fixes, UI enhancements, and mentorship support for junior developers.

detail: Mentored engineering students and coordinated research outputs across thesis and manuscript reviews.
highlights: Mentored 42 thesis groups (120+ students) with a 100% graduation rate.
Reviewed 34 narrative reports and 4 thesis manuscripts as Engineering Research Coordinator.
